title: ‘Pogi Was Impossible to Follow’: How the Tour of Flanders will be Different Without Wout van Aert and Tadej Pogačar
content:
Pedersen and Van der Poel could benefit in wide-open race: 'One thing for sure, it's going to be a f**cking hard race.'

Read the full article at ‘Pogi Was Impossible to Follow’: How the Tour of Flanders will be Different Without Wout van Aert and Tadej Pogačar on Velo.
author: ahood
